description:
This app calculates and keeps track of your estimated BAC (Blood Alcohol Content) in real time. Add the drinks you've had, and the app will do the rest! 

Features:
* Real-time, always updated BAC estimate
* Calculated time until estimated BAC is at zero and a predefined limit
* Alarm notifications when your estimated BAC is at zero and at a predefined limit
* List of drinks you've had going back a predefined number of days or drinks
* Graph your estimated BAC over 12 hours, 24 hours, or through all your drink history
* Add drinks from any time in the last 24 hours
* Download drink ABV data from the web
* Metric & Imperial units
* Full user manual (choose "Help" from the app menu)

I made this app for fun, not for profit. If you appreciate this app, then give your cab driver or designated driver a few extra bucks.

Special thanks to Chelsea Riedy for making the app icon! The icon is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States License.

If you'd like to translate this app, let me know.
